long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Image editor, storage and CDN that helps with image transformations, reducing the size of the image when you are loading them and makes your websites faster. 
The CDN has presence in 192 locations worldwide. Also easy digital asset management via auto tagging making it very easy to find images that you upload on your storage.
